attributes.action: Make Climate Change the most important agenda in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit is being touted as the most important issue of recent years and having the biggest impact on young people's lives. No, no and no. Climate Change is considerably more important and is being sidelined by this fiasco.
attributes.background: Sign this petition to let Parliament know that it is the will of the People to tackle Climate Change in a quick an orderly fashion. If we had spent as much time and money on tackling Climate Change as we have Brexit, we'd all be looking at a much brighter future.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do

If you would like the House of Commons to debate climate change every month, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245140
